name: BEST WESTERN Hanford Inn

reviews.text: This motel is nice enough, the Internet works very well, beds are comfortable, rooms are clean. We have stayed twice in the past year. The first time a noisy group of children's sports team members was there and there was a bit of noise. This last stay we all noticed the noise from the nearby freeway. So, paradoxically, the motel's easy access from State Route 198 also makes for its worst aspect, noise that includes a loudspeaker system used at a nearby car dealership. However, the price is right, and it is convenient to relatives we were visiting on both occasions.
reviews.title: Hanford lodgings

reviews.text: The staff (Sonia) I met was extremely helpful in making sure that my needs and satisfaction were met during my stay. I was pleasantly surprised with the cleanliness and accommodations of the property. I would recommend staying at this hotel to anyone who would stay in Hanford.
reviews.title: Great Staff & Great Room

reviews.text: The motel was clean and employees very nice. The trains were noisy, and a neighbor in the room next door talked loudly early in the a.m. (He was inconsiderate) We would stay there again, because the motels can't be blamed for inconsiderate guests.
reviews.title: A pleasant surprise

reviews.text: A nice surprise in Hanford, a small town atmosphere. Very clean and well maintained. Last time I had a room like this I was in a tuscany style Best Western in Healdsburg, but it was very nice to find this in little ole Hanford.
reviews.title: Personal

description: Recently renovated Hotel. Our spacious rooms are available to suit all your needs. Rooms are nonsmoking with your choice of a single King, single Queen or two Queen size beds. Each room offers every amenity that you may need. Refrigerator, microwave, hair dryer, iron & board as well as in room coffee. Our award winning staff is courteous, friendly and awaiting your arrival! Each morning, we offer a Hot Breakfast to each of our valued Guests starting at 6:00am to 9:00am. A pool is also available to our valued Guests from 9:00am to 9:00pm. Our exterior hotel enables you to park safely in front of your room, please note that an elevator is not available. We look forward to your visit.
